ModMetaData.name: Colonist Bar Hiding
ModMetaData.author: Saucy_Pigeon
ModMetaData.description:
Allows you to hide colonists from your colonist bar, decreasing clutter. How it works: - Right click on your colonist bar (even if all colonists have been removed). - Click "Manage colonist bar...". - Click "Restore" or "Remove" on the appropriate colonist. Compatible with save games. Hidden colonists are saved, even if you disable the mod between saves.
Special thanks: - Proxyer for providing the Japanese translation
